title: Setup
text: goal tarflow.iquizoo provide workflow auto-generation IQUIZOO data powered targets package.

title: Setup
text: preprocessing IQUIZOO data used laborious datasets disorganized. Newer version database games make things much better. Now package called preproc.iquizoo, containing required functions used preprocessing. facilitates analysis significantly. now, advent targets, can easily setup workflows automate preprocessing! package . Hopefully, make analysis IQUIZOO data favorable thing.

title: Setup
text: can install development version GitHub : can install stable version psychelzh’s R-universe :

title: Setup
text: simplest way use package call tarflow.iquizoo::use_targets_template() generate {targets} pipeline. basic parameters edit (follow generated script), can run pipeline executing targets::tar_make() R console. pipeline executed parallel default.

title: Check if the database based on the given data source is ready — check_source
text: TRUE database ready, FALSE otherwise.

title: Fetch data from iQuizoo database — fetch_data
Fetch data from iQuizoo database — fetch_data
text: query parameterized SQL query. Note query also contain glue expression inject table name, .e., "{ table_name }". project_id project id bound query. game_id game id bound query. ... arguments passed fetch_iquizoo(). fetch. Can either "raw_data" "scores".

title: Fetch data from iQuizoo database — fetch_data
text: data.frame contains fetched data.

title: Fetch result of query from iQuizoo database — fetch_iquizoo
Fetch result of query from iQuizoo database — fetch_iquizoo
text: query character string containing SQL. ... arguments passed DBI::dbConnect(). params parameters bound query. Default NULL, see DBI::dbGetQuery() details. source data source data fetched. See setup_source() details.

title: Fetch result of query from iQuizoo database — fetch_iquizoo
text: data.frame contains fetched data.

what: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: Calculate indices using data returned wrangle_data().

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
code: preproc_data(   data,   fn,   name_raw_parsed = "raw_parsed",   out_name_index = "index_name",   out_name_score = "score",   ... )

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: data data.frame contains raw data. fn can function formula. See rlang::as_function() details. name_raw_parsed column name stores user's raw data format list data.frames. out_name_index column name used output storing name calculated index. out_name_score column name used output storing value calculated index. ... Additional arguments passed fn.

title: Feed Raw Data to Pre-processing — preproc_data
text: data.frame contains calculated indices. index names stored column out_name_index, index values stored column out_name_score.

what: Setup MySQL database connection option file — setup_option_file
title: Setup MySQL database connection option file — setup_option_file
text: function create MySQL option file given path. ensure works, set environment variables calling function: MYSQL_HOST: host name MySQL server. MYSQL_USER: user name MySQL server. MYSQL_PASSWORD: password MySQL server.

title: Setup MySQL database connection option file — setup_option_file
code: setup_option_file(path = NULL, overwrite = FALSE, quietly = FALSE)

title: Setup MySQL database connection option file — setup_option_file
text: path path option file. Default location operating system dependent. Windows, C:/.cnf. systems, ~/..cnf. overwrite Whether overwrite existing option file. quietly logical indicates whether message suppressed.

title: Setup MySQL database connection option file — setup_option_file
text: NULL (invisible).

title: Set data source — setup_source
text: Set data source

title: Set data source — setup_source
code: setup_source(   driver = getOption("tarflow.driver"),   dsn = getOption("tarflow.dsn"),   groups = getOption("tarflow.groups") )

title: Set data source — setup_source
text: driver driver used. Set option "tarflow.driver". Options odbc::odbc() RMariaDB::MariaDB(), need pre-configurations. Default first available one. dsn data source name ODBC database connector. See odbc::dbConnect() information. Used driver set odbc::odbc(). groups Section identifier default.file. See RMariaDB::MariaDB() information. Used driver set RMariaDB::MariaDB().

title: Set data source — setup_source
text: S3 class tarflow.source options.

what: Set up templates used to fetch data — setup_templates
title: Set up templates used to fetch data — setup_templates
text: want extract data based parameters, use function set SQL templates. Note SQL queries parameterized.

title: Set up templates used to fetch data — setup_templates
code: setup_templates(   contents = NULL,   users = NULL,   raw_data = NULL,   scores = NULL,   progress_hash = NULL )

title: Set up templates used to fetch data — setup_templates
text: contents SQL template file used fetch contents. least project_id game_id columns included fetched data based template. project_id used parameter users project templates, three used raw_data scores templates. users SQL template file used fetch users. Usually need change . raw_data SQL template file used fetch raw data. See fetch_data() details. Usually need change . scores SQL template file used fetch scores. See fetch_data() details. Usually need change . progress_hash SQL template file used fetch progress hash. Usually need change .

title: Set up templates used to fetch data — setup_templates
text: S3 object class tarflow.template options.

what: Generate a set of targets for pre-processing of iQuizoo data — tar_prep_iquizoo
title: Generate a set of targets for pre-processing of iQuizoo data — tar_prep_iquizoo
text: target factory prepares set target objects used fetch data iQuizoo database, separated static branches specific project task/game combination. pre-processing fetched data can also added requested.

title: Generate a set of targets for pre-processing of iQuizoo data — tar_prep_iquizoo
code: tar_prep_iquizoo(   params,   ...,   contents = NULL,   what = c("all", "raw_data", "scores"),   action_raw_data = c("all", "parse", "none"),   templates = setup_templates(),   check_progress = TRUE )

title: Generate a set of targets for pre-processing of iQuizoo data — tar_prep_iquizoo
text: params data.frame list contains parameters bound query. Default templates require specifying organization_name project_name, order. contents template specified without parameters, set empty vector NULL. contents argument specified, argument omitted. ... future usage. empty. contents contents structure used configuration data fetching. typically automatically fetched database based contents template templates. NULL, used directly ignore specified templates. Note contents least contains project_id game_id names. fetch. basically two types data, .e., raw data scores. former logged raw data trial tasks/games, latter scores calculated iQuizoo server. set "", raw data scores fetched. actions fetched raw data can specified action_raw_data. action_raw_data action taken fetched raw data. two consecutive actions, .e., wrangling pre-processing. former parse raw data tidy format, latter calculate indices based parsed data. set "", wrangling pre-processing done. set "parse", wrangling done. set "none", neither done. "scores", argument ignored. templates SQL template files used fetch data. See setup_templates() details. check_progress Whether check progress hash. Set FALSE project finalized.

title: Generate a set of targets for pre-processing of iQuizoo data — tar_prep_iquizoo
text: list target objects.

Create standard data fetching targets pipeline script — use_targets_template

title: Wrangle Raw Data — wrangle_data
text: Data wrangling first step data analysis.

title: Wrangle Raw Data — wrangle_data
text: data raw data. name_raw_json column name stores user's raw data format json string. name_raw_parsed name used store parsed data.

title: Wrangle Raw Data — wrangle_data
text: data.frame contains parsed data.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.7.0
text: Renamed use_targets() use_targets_template avoid name masking targets::use_targets(). Renamed prepare_fetch_data() tar_prep_iquizoo() obey name convention targets factory.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.6.2
text: Enhance organization pkgdown reference.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.6.1
text: Enhanced documentations prepare_fetch_data().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.6.0
text: Let fetch_data() extract course_date automatically. way, contents (regardless based template feeding directly) require course_date column now .

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.5.1
text: Use data.iquizoo::match_preproc(). Added quietly argument setup_option_file(), now messages suppressed loading package. Added test cases database settings. Note test cases cover odbc driver now.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.5.0
text: Let pipeline perform raw data parsing indices calculation combined raw data single tasks (#73). Let prepare_fetch_data() signal error contents contains data. Rename target contents contents_origin avoid possible name conflict contents input argument. limitation {targets} package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.5.0
text: Added contents argument prepare_fetch_data() support pre-fetched contents contents configuration. useful already fetched contents data want use directly.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.4.0
text: Support action_raw_data argument prepare_fetch_data() specify action raw data. useful want parsed raw data indices, e.g., action_raw_data = "parse" perform indices calculation. Added raw_data_parsed targets combination removed raw_data targets combination, potential bug unparsed raw_data targets combination really intent.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.3.4
text: Fix roundtrip issue, see issue {bit64} package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.3.3
text: Ensure tarchetypes::tar_map() rely columns project_id, game_id course_date template SQL output.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.3.2
text: ensure option file correctly set , specify three environment variables: MYSQL_HOST, MYSQL_USER, MYSQL_PASSWORD. See option file template details. Note check_source() returns FALSE, package call setup_option_file() setup option file loading phase. check option file correctly set .

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.3.1
text: Let users template independent input parameters. means advanced users minimally specify contents template .

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.3.0
text: RMariaDB::MariaDB() database driver detected higher priority, odbc::odbc() technically deprecated, although still supported (sure working) now (#68). Renamed fetch_parameterized() fetch_iquizoo(). latter shorter echoes package name. Removed fetch_batch() vector parameters supported DBI::dbGetQuery(). fetch_iquizoo() handles vector scalar parameters.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.2.1
text: Supported remove duplicates users. Useful different projects organization share users. Enhance internal logic.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.2.0
text: Added setup_source() specify data source. Arguments driver, dsn groups fetch_parameterized() now live function. Let params argument fetch_parameterized() optional (...) parameters query. Note checked beforehand, take care whether parameters. Supported custom SQL templates. users want use different parameter names default one, support paired SQL templates. See setup_templates() details (#66).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.2.0
text: name changed project_hash progress_hash, informative. argument always_check_hash prepare_fetch_data() changed check_progress accordingly. Now multiple projects, hash separated project. SQL now independent user’s parameters (#67).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.1.2
text: Fixed bug named parameters RMariaDB::MariaDB() used.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.1.1
text: Fixed bug fetch_preset() pass ... fetch_parameterized() correctly.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.1.0
text: Changed parameters organization name project name. Former course specification removed.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.1.0
text: Support specify dsn groups options tarflow.dsn tarflow.groups respectively. useful default values suitable . Added project users pipeline. Added support auto-check whether projects data --date. turned default, can turn setting always_check_hash FALSE use_targets().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.1.0
text: Fix bug targets flow fail meaningless message odbc configure correctly.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.0.3
text: Remove unicode characters document.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.0.2
text: Fix encoding issue Rd.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.0.1
text: Fix internal issues. user-level updates.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 3.0.0
text: Supported new database design IQUIZOO. Now Rmarkdown templates removed, users call tarflow.iquizoo::use_targets() generate pipeline. Limited parameters settings course_name course_period now. parameters added future. Added game_stage game_star scores data (#29).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.5
text: Supported () input literal query query_file argument pickup(). Added project names game version names data query template.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.5
text: Fix typos documentation.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.4
text: Enhanced templates: now content_orginal_data_detail content_score_detail tables lived iqizoo_content_db database.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.3
text: Added tests. user-level updates.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.2
text: Fixed bug .onAttach() display incorrect message loading package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.1
text: Fixed option "tarflow.driver" working. Removed ... argument connect_to_db() just internal function.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.5.0
text: default value option "tarflow.driver", find first available driver odbc RMariaDB. neither available, message prompted inform user install one.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.1
text: Added new argument add_keyword compose_where() allow adding keyword clause. useful want compose clause subquery.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.0
text: Removed search_games_mem() behave expected. Especially, memoise::forget() work. working version added rmarkdown template.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.4.0
text: Enhanced code quality.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.2
text: Fixed errors caused <integer64> class. Now data.iquizoo::game_info data returned pickup() stores game_id <integer64> class bit64 package, tarchetypes::tar_map() support class, convert <character> class workaround.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.1
text: Fixed recoverable error message pattern match cases.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Implemented new updates data.iquizoo package, now input extra configured game_info data package. Suggests {preproc.iquizoo} 2.4.0 higher now, require preprocessing functions support ..

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Supported setting custom variable name parsed raw data.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.3.0
text: Fixed bug integer64 type.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.2.0
text: Now preproc_data() use purrr::possibly() suppress errors.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.1.0
text: Now parsed data nested data.frame() data, efficient (#50). Now pickup() support input literal sql query string argument query_file. recognized literal sql query, string must contains least one new line. Now raw data also fetch "game_version" column.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 2.0.0
text: Now preproc_data() returns indices tidyr::pivot_longer(), column names now "index_name" "score", consistent among games. Now wrangle_data() also changes character values lower case. better logic dealing data preprocessing preproc.iquizoo functions accept .input .extra inputs.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.1
text: Remove old content github README.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: init() related functions totally removed, deprecated "0.2.0" later. fetch() fetch_single_game() renamed pickup() pickup_single_game() avoid name masking DBI::fetch() (see #45).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: Fix bug preproc_data() occurred using complex dplyr verbs (see #43).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 1.0.0
text: Added tests many core functions except pickup() (see #41).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.1
text: Adapt new preproc.iquizoo data.iquizoo packages.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.1
text: Fix target name problem.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Now init() deprecated, rmarkdown template recommended instead.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Support setting pipeline rmarkdown using template (#35).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.10
text: Unified user identifier 'OrganizationUserId'.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.9
text: Fixed exception fetching users new version database. Now base_grade_class obsolete removed query.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.8
text: Fix exception encoding issue SQL query removing recoding user sex.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.7
text: Fix exception caused new database design IQUIZOO.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.6
text: Set known_only FALSE downloading pre-calculated scores (#32).

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.6
text: Fix exception using key one target (#33). Fix issue TarScript() one codes (thus unique() necessary called) update.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.5
text: Add known_only argument (default TRUE) search_games(), uses games dataproc.iquizoo::game_info . set FALSE fetching original data.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.4
text: Add encoding argument (default "UTF-8") fetch(), used set encoding SQL query files. also fix encoding issues Windows OS.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.3
text: Correct logic step_query(). query named games included targets. queries named users abilities always fetched. queries depend whether separated .

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.2
text: Supported games abilities.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.1
text: Adapt new database design IQUIZOO.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.1.0
text: Moved wrangle_data() (#24) dataproc.iquizoo package now. , data preprocessing parts moved dataproc.iquizoo package now. better fits mental models packages.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.7
text: Removed calc_indices (#24) added wrangle_data() fit jobs package. new function parse input json string stack long format, keep meta info attribute "info" output. , output added subclass "tbl_meta" print() method.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.7
text: Added fetch_single_game() treat special case fetching dataset single game. used especially using branches. Unexported compose_where() insert_where(), just usage current package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.6
text: Use stringr::str_detect() remove empty json string. Now "[]" "{}" removed.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.5
text: Fix issue empty json string removing empty (.e., "[]") json string data validation step calc_indices().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.4
text: Fix issue invalid json string introducing data validation step calc_indices().

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.3
text: Fix issue data name case, now names translated lower-case ones preprocessing.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.2
text: New feature introduced huge change use_targets() removed. init() used replace . function, can define many schemas. Maybe future, logic modified better handle schemas.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.1
text: Fix encoding issue Windows system. Add new schema “original” download original data . Use new yaml configurations api. Support types config_where fetch_from_v3(). Besides list type, now can specify data.frame type even character type config_where. helpful config_where generated yaml config, R code directly. Rename fetch_from_v3() fetch(), API now fetch(query_file, config_where, dsn). say, can now pass data source name database . Export S3 method compose_where(), originally named compose_where_clause(). Support new argument separate use_targets() optionally separate fetching branches games. Support new argument ignore_tar use_targets() optionally ignore internal data targets package version control system (.e., “.gitignore”). Now use_targets() skip “config.yml” file silently already exists one. Moved internal data named game_info “dataproc.iquizoo (>= 0.2.6)” package.

title: tarflow.iquizoo 0.0.0.9001
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
